*[In Development]*
Knights of Neon is an action packed Hack n' Slash with RPG elements set in the retro realm of Cyberspace.

Prepare to immerse yourself in a thrilling fusion of medieval valor and futuristic cyber-warfare with "Knights of Neon," the ultimate VR combat experience. 

Unleash Futuristic Melee Mayhem:
In "Knights of Neon," embrace the adrenaline-pumping rush of wielding advanced cybernetic weapons, forged with cutting-edge technology. Engage in high-octane battles against formidable adversaries as you hack, slash, and dash your way through waves of enemies. 

Immersive Storytelling and Dynamic Characters:
Dive deep into a rich sci-fi narrative with fully voiced dialogue exchanges that help bring the digital world to life. Forge alliances, uncover secrets, and confront the enigmatic forces that threaten to unravel the fabric of reality itself.

Craft Your Destiny:
Forge your path to victory with a robust crafting system that empowers you to customize your arsenal of weapons and gear. Experiment with different combinations to suit your playstyle.

Join the Battle for Cyberspace:
Are you ready to become a legend in the digital annals of history? Hone your skills, and prepare to face the ultimate challenge in "Knights of Neon." The fate of humanity hangs in the balance - will you rise to the occasion and emerge victorious, or will you be consumed by the neon-lit shadows of Cyberspace? The choice is yours.
